game.title: The Missing Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost city.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been stolen from the museum. It's said to be hidden in a lost city deep within the forest. Your mission is to retrieve it and return it to its rightful owners.

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city
tasks.description: Speak to the local villagers and gather any information they may have about the lost city.
Make your way through the dense forest to reach the entrance of the lost city.
Search for the artifact in the ancient ruins and retrieve it.
